official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide an exception for certain qualified retired law enforcement officers to carry a concealed firearm, and for other purposes.
short_title: Law Enforcement Officers Safety COVID Extension Act of 2021

summary.text:
Law Enforcement Officers Safety COVID Extension Act of 2021

This bill allows a retired law enforcement officer to carry concealed firearms in calendar years 2021 and 2022 if the retired officer met the federal qualification requirements (e.g., training standards) to carry concealed firearms during calendar year 2019.
